Title: Janet and Michael
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Kate Gersten, Kate Gersten (executive story editor), Cord Jefferson (story editor), Andrew Law (story editor), Daniel Schofield (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: When the neighborhood experiences a small glitch, Michael has to resolve the issue with Janet before it gets out of control.
